sourcing.instructions: - Er2O3: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in rare earth materials.
steps: - Er2O3: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in rare earth materials.
1. In a clean, dry container, measure 20.00 g of Er2O3 and 30.00 g of SiO2.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean, dry container, measure 20.00 g of Er2O3 and 30.00 g of SiO2.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 800°C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 800°C.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the temperature to drop naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the temperature to drop naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
